name: Rhythm Drive: Synthwave City
description:
Rhythm Drive: Synthwave City is the first game of its kind combining the rhythm genre with casual driving. Set in an 80's inspired retro city with a large pink sun, each track is brought to life with synchronized beats and visual effects. Explore the city and beyond and complete challenges to test your driving skills. Customize the way your car drives to your liking; do you want max speed? A lot of drift? or just a chill drive? Dozens of parameters can be changed to drive exactly how you want!

Features:
  • Rhythm game while driving with highscores.
  • Over a audio dozen tracks
  • Over a dozen challenges to complete and unlock new car models
  • Full car tuning customization
  • Camera customization
  • A retro/synthwave style open world

Steam achievements coming soon.

Drive however you want while keeping a rhythm!
